text: Jana Eve Bennett OBE (1955 â€“ 11 January 2022) was an American-born British media businesswoman. She was a member of the board of the British Library. She was President and General Manager of History, and H2 at A+E Networks in New York City. Bennett was born in Cooperstown, New York. Bennett was diagnosed with brain cancer in 2019. She died on 11 January 2022 in London from the disease, at the age of 66. ==References== Category:1955 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Naturalised citizens of the United Kingdom Category:Businesspeople from London Category:Businesspeople from New York (state) Category:Deaths from brain cancer Category:Cancer deaths in London
title: Jana Bennett
